actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to permit the use of lands within the Colonial National Historical Park in the Commonwealth of Virginia to enable natural gas service to be provided to the Coast Guard Reserve Training Center.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to issue a right-of-way permit to the Virginia Gas Company granting an underground easement for the construction, operation, and maintenance of one natural gas distribution pipeline under and across the Colonial National Historical Park in Virginia to provide natural gas to the U.S. Coast Guard Reserve Training Center at Yorktown, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to permit the use of lands within the Colonial National Historical Park in the Commonwealth of Virginia to enable natural gas service to be provided to the Coast Guard Reserve Training Center.
